ingredients.ingredient: 1 (16 ounce) jar sliced jalapeno peppers, with liquid

cookingTips: Slice carrots uniformly for even cooking and texture
Use the liquid from jarred jalapenos for added flavor
Store in refrigerator and serve chilled as a condiment
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user through layering prepared vegetables in a jar, heating vinegar with jalapeno liquid, pouring over vegetables, and refrigerating for pickling.
